item.description:
Our 1st meeting for the 2012 fair will be on

Monday, Nov. 21st at 7p.m. at the

SW Library (Friends Room)

We will be discussing the general fair info (dates, hours, admission, etc) and then focusing on the areas that need to get started planning there areas. Specifically we will work with Finance (amusement area), Entertainment (major attractions), Sponsors (new packages, grant writing) and Marketing (billboards and social media)  along with a host of other topics, so the
committees can begin working over the winter months.  In addition, we will discuss the South Windsor Jaycees Foundation and how the fair fits

Great opportunity for people that have not been involved with the fair to sign up to work with committee chairman and lend a hand in the planning of the fair

Light Dinner to be provided.

Topics we will be discussing

General
Understanding the South Windsor Jaycees Foundation role
Fair dates and hours

Positions available - The following chairmanships and roles are in need of people to handle them
Chairmanships - Community Relations, Food, Marketing, Vendors & Volunteers
Sponsorship Grant researchers and writers - We need people to find grants for us to apply to and then others to assist in getting them for submission. There is a lot of money out there, but it takes time and effort to get it.

Finance
Admission prices

Sponsors
Preliminary discussion on adding more activity or attraction based sponsorships.
Grants

Entertainment
Potential new major attractions to consider
* The best way to find new events is to look at other events and see what they are offering.  www.ctfairs.org lists all the fairs in CT.  But any search of events, fairs, festivals will turn up lots of events that will offer new options

Community Relations
Preliminary discussion on finding a highlight activity the fair can promote and become know for doing (this could also be a part of the entertainment contests, etc)

Vendors
Pricing for food, regular and non-profit vendors

Marketing
Large billboard option versus smaller billboard in more towns

Grounds, Agriculture, Animals, Volunteers  & Food
No specifics topics unless chairman have issues or questions to be discussed at this time
item.name: 2012 Wapping Fair Kick off Meeting
